--------------------------
pyFprime.fprime
--------------------------

Example program to call this module::

    from pyFprime import fprime
    fprime.main()

documentation from source code comments
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: pyFprime.fprime
    :members: 
    :synopsis: GUI, computes and plots elemental scattering factors
